ContentClassification.TableReference: Statistics New Zealand, “New Zealand Life Tables: 2000-02”, Statistics New Zealand (Wellington, 2004). Accessed January, 2014 from: http://www.stats.govt.nz/browse_for_stats/health/life_expectancy/period-life-tables.aspx
ContentClassification.TableName: 1995-97 Population Period Life Table – Total Male
ContentClassification.TableDescription: 1995-97 Population Period Life Table – Total Male. Minimum Age: 0 Maximum Age: 100
ContentClassification.Comments: Study Data: Total table includes Māori and non Māori lives combined. Māori classified as people with 'half or more Māori blood' while Non-Māori people are those not included in the Māori life tables. Māori life tables based on deaths of people with Māori ethnicity and the population of Māori ethnicity. Non-Māori life tables based on deaths and population not included in the Māori life tables. Both the Māori and non-Māori life tables make an allowance for deaths and population with no ethnic response. An adjustment made to Māori/non-Māori deaths for undercount of Māori deaths using the adjustment ratios presented in Ajwani (2003). Methodology: Deaths registered in New Zealand of people resident in New Zealand for the period 1995-97. Base from estimated resident population at 30 June 1996 revised (based on census usually resident population count at 5 March 1996). Age 0 had special handling. Central death rates for each age calculated and smoothed using cubic spline. Values for very high ages had some minor adjustments. Data Transcription Errors: None. Data Certified: 01/2014.

MetaData.TableDescription: 1995-97 Population Period Life Table – Total Male. Minimum Age: 0 Maximum Age: 100
